name: KT puzzle
description:
do you want to follow  the development of A puzzle platform game?

This game will get frequent updates

 Made with blender and UE4

controls:

bottom controller face button = jump

up D-Pad(hold) = topdown view

left stick = Move

More levels coming.

Keyboard is supported 

 
optimized for a ps4 controller with ds4windows
features,
feedback vibration.

Donations greatly appreciated

 Thanks,

 Finn Mckay.

 AAnzg indie

 Developer
